title: Beautiful Blue Dragon
subtitle: Acrylic on Cardstock
alt: blue how to train your dragon animated dragon sticking its tongue out on a lighter blue background
description:
2023 

This is the front of a card I made for one of my friends who really enjoys the How to Train Your Dragon world. I have really enjoyed drawing dragons like Smaug from The Hobbit in the past, but it was a really fun challenge to paint one in a more animated style.
